mapper.select: select TBL_ID,COLUMN_NAME,TYPE_NAME,COMMENT from COLUMNS_V2 a INNER JOIN SDS b on a.CD_ID = b.CD_ID INNER JOIN TBLS c on b.SD_ID = c.SD_ID where c.TBL_ID= #{tableId}

select TBL_ID,CONCAT(COLUMN_NAME,'(',TYPE_NAME,')',' ',IFNULL(COMMENT,'')) as COLUMN_NAME,TYPE_NAME,COMMENT from COLUMNS_V2 a INNER JOIN SDS b on a.CD_ID = b.CD_ID INNER JOIN TBLS c on b.SD_ID = c.SD_ID where c.TBL_ID= #{tableId}
